PerfectNetExp.abs: 9. 戟形(hastate):其基部之裂瓣向外展开(图4:i).10. 盾形(peltate):叶柄连结于通常为圆形叶身下表面的中央或近中央(图4:j).11. 贯生.
debauch的翻译查词例句词组大耳朵英语 ...  hastate 戟状的 ... libra 磅, 天秤座.
农业词汇英语翻译(H-N) ... harvesting of cocoon 采茧 hastate 戟形的 hatchery 孵化场.
地质学专业英语词汇H-3|（翻译下载词典） ... 斜辉橄榄岩 harzburgite 箭头状的；戟状的 hastate 富铁钠闪石 hastingsite.

list.abs: Easily recognized by the hastate - sagittate leaf bases and yellow corollas ., 容易通过戟形箭头形的叶基础和黄的花冠的承认.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 18th cent.: from Latin hastatus, from hasta 'spear'

means.word_mean: 1. of a leaf shape; like a spear point, with flaring pointed lobes at the base
